library(magrittr)

## Chr 15 analyses

```{r}
dat <- readr::read_csv("../data/pheno_clinical_4qtl2_win2_05OCT2019_v4.csv")
phe <- as.matrix(dat[, c("lungCFU", "IL17")])
rownames(phe) <- dat$X1
start <- max(which(map.1$`15` < 20)) 
end <- max(which(map.1$`15` < 40))
```

```{r}
sp_out <- qtl2pleio::scan_pvl(probs = genoprobs.1$`15`, 
                                pheno = phe[, 1:2],
                              addcovar = addcovar,
                                kinship = kinship$`15`,
                                start_snp = start,
                                n_snp = end - start + 1, 
                                n_cores = nc
                                )
(lrt <- qtl2pleio::calc_lrt_tib(sp_out))
```

```{r}
sp_out %>%
  qtl2pleio::calc_profile_lods() %>%
  qtl2pleio::add_pmap(pmap = map.1$`15`) %>%
  ggplot2::ggplot() + ggplot2::geom_line(ggplot2::aes(x = marker_position, y = profile_lod, colour = trait))
```

```{r}
(pp_index <- qtl2pleio::find_pleio_peak_tib(tib = sp_out, 
                                           start_snp = start
                                           ))
set.seed(3411192)
b_out <- qtl2pleio::boot_pvl(probs = genoprobs.1$`15`, 
                    pheno = phe[, 1:2],
                    addcovar = addcovar,
                    kinship = kinship$`15`,
                    start_snp = start,
                    n_snp = end - start + 1, 
                    n_cores = nc, 
                    pleio_peak_index = pp_index,
                    nboot_per_job = 400
                   )
(pvalue <- mean(b_out >= lrt))
saveRDS(b_out, "../results/boot-Chr15.rds")
```
